Upcoming Events                Quick Links            Peer Coaches                    Learning Resources            Contact Us            Make an Appointment           Our Services & Initiatives           Recruitment & Admission Assistance  Recruiters guide students through the application process and promote interest in higher education and college readiness             Advising & Student Development  This provides a comprehensive plan of services and programs to assist with the retention, persistence, and graduation.                 Services & Initiatives  We seek to address the unique interests and needs of African American students at UIC. Students who participate in AAAN programming will graduate from UIC as highly engaged leaders prepared to contribute to a global society.
